subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Peja Stojakovic hit a 3-pointer and three free throws in the final minute Tuesday night to lift the New Orleans Hornets to a 98-97 victory over the host Orlando Magic.
snippet: Peja Stojakovic hit a 3-pointer and three free throws in the final minute Tuesday night to lift the New Orleans Hornets to a 98-97 victory over the host Orlando Magic.
